alert.note: Alert for Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ADAMS, FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, PIKE, EASTERN HIGHLAND, WESTERN SCIOTO AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM EDT... At 1223 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Washington Court House to near Hillsboro to 6 miles west of West Union, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Circleville, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Waverly, West Union, Piketon, Peebles, Leesburg, Winchester, Kingston, Marshall, Williamsport, Seaman, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, Belfast and Highland Holiday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto
